knimeNode.name: GATKFilterVQSLOD
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters a given VCF file using the VQSLOD value generated by GATK VQSR.

fullDescription.intro: Filters a given VCF file using the VQSLOD value generated by GATK VQSR.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Set threshold for repeated execution. Only used if HTE is enabled in the preference page.
Set path GenomeAnalysisTK.jar and memory usage.
Coverage analysis can be restricted to genomic regions defined in a BED file.

tab.name: SelectVariants
tab.option: Select column of input table in which path to input VCF file is specified.
VQSLOD cutoff which is used to discard variants. All variants below the given value are removed.

ports.inPort: Table containing the input VCF file in the specified column.
